ComicInfo.Summary: Supreme Apocalypse Part 2 of 5: Prophet, Greylore and Psi-Storm travel to D'Kay only to learn that Darkthornn has captured the rest of the Berzerkers and turned Supreme into his mindless lacky. Prophet takes on Supreme while 'Lore and Psi attempt to free their friends. Meanwhile, back on Earth, Baptist continues to sacrifice as many humans as he can in order to open a portal to D'Kay.
ComicInfo.Title: Supreme Apocalypse Part 2 of 5
